00081 struct MinetEvent {

00083     enum {IN, OUT, INOUT, NONE}                          direction;

00085     int                                                  error;
00086     double                                               overtime;

00093

00096

00109  public:
00110     MinetException(const MinetException &rhs) : std::string(rhs) {}

00113     
00114     virtual ~MinetException() {}
00115     
00116     const MinetException &operator=(const MinetException &rhs) {
00117         ((std::string *)this)->operator = (rhs); 
00118         return *this;
00119     }
00120     
00121     virtual std::ostream & Print(std::ostream &os) const { 
00122         os << "MinetException(" << ((const std::string &)(*this)) << ")"; 
00123         return os;
00124     }
